ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' • ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+:\d+:\d+)/,''),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: og('description'),
  url: og('novel:read_url'),
};

book;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var p = result.match(/共(\d+)页/)[1];
var list = [{
	t: '1',
	h: baseUrl
}];
for (var i = 2; i <= p; i++) {
	list.push({
		t: '' + i,
		h: baseUrl.replace(/\.html/, '_' + i + '.html')
	})
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: o('.book-name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
  author: o('.au-name'),
	kind: o('.label') + ',' + o('.state').replace(/中|已/,''),
  wordCount: o('.nums span:eq(0) i'),
	latest: o('.book-new-chapter .tit').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
  intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('.time').replace(/· |\s\d+:.*/g,'') + '\n' + o('.book-dec').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, ''),
  cover: J.select('.book-img-w img').attr('src'),
	url: baseUrl + 'catalog/',
};
book;
</js>

	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
  wordCount: parseInt(o('#count span:eq(4)').replace(/,|字/g,'')/10000) + '万',
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#bookintro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items.slice(0,10);}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=2&sortMode=DESC'));

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

//返回json字符串
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

ruleContent.content:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集(，|)/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?(阅读模式！|浏览器！)/g,"")
.replace(/禁止转码.*?请退出阅读模式！/g,"")
.replace(/chapter_c\(\)\;/g,"")
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'https://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'https://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'https://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'https://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'https://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

bookSourceComment:
─────当前版本Pro V12─────

点击登录即可查看:

0、书源制作思路

1、版本更新日志

2、书源用法展示

3、相关问题解释

───────搜索格式────────

完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名
简化格式4：#作者

──────前缀设置全体───────

转化：关键字前加“@”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`优先考虑将链接转化为电脑版，争取获得目录不分页的电脑版链接

单页：关键字前加“!”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`搜到什么点开就是什么，不做目录识别也不做章节识别，自动为当前网页构造目录，当前网页的内容储存在“预览内容”中

跳转：关键字前加“^”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`允许目录自动跳转，目录标题中写着点击跳转时可如此做。

逆向：关键字前加“-”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`目录章节逆向排序，配合指定网站的搜索方式针对小说全是逆向排序的网站比较方便。

图文：关键字前加“|”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`正文只查询文字，不查询图片。或关键字前加“_”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`正文只查询图片，不查询文字。这两个前缀只能设置其一，都不设置时默认图文都查询。

──────简介设置单本───────

说明：将特定字段插入简介保存后，点刷新可实现目录跳转、目录逆向排序、目录链接指定等多种功能。

局限：修改简介再点刷新只会控制当前书籍执行指定功能，想控制所有书籍执行指定功能，请采用上面`全部设置`的方式在关键字前加相应前缀并重新搜索

位置：插入到简介最前端

格式：在“{}”中包含以下文字就会触发相应功能
─────⤵
转：尽量考虑将链接转化为电脑版，争取获得目录不分页的电脑版链接

直：不做目录识别，直接将详情页作为目录页，或以“直[目录链接]”格式直接指定目录链接，目录识别错误时可这种做。

跳：允许目录自动跳转，目录标题说点击跳转时可如此做。

全：直接显示“预览正文”和查询到的所有章节，跳过章节筛选环节，单页文章和部分筛选后章节不全的小说网站可这样做。

逆：设置目录章节逆向排序。

图：设置成看图模式(默认为图文模式)，只显示图片，不显示文字。

字：设置成纯字模式(默认为图文模式)，只显示文本，不显示图片。
─────⤴

示例：{直[https://m.biquku.la/0/425/]全字}

效果：①直接将“https://m.biquku.la/0/425/”作为小说目录链接②显示元素查询得到的全部章节列表，不做章节筛选③以纯文字模式查找正文内容，避免图片干扰。
